title: Zed trainer
body:
Hello!

So I am lvl 5 with Zed, but my question is, is there a person that wants to train me when I'm Zed so that I can get better @ the champ, and hopefully kick Kayles ass when I need to :)

replies.body:
Haha, nope, kalye is the truest, bluest zed counter out there

But I can teach you some yas pwnage (we all know yas is harder to beat every1 with)
Yasuo v Zed is ez 4 me, cause it's up to skill
yes. and if yasuo isn't complete retard or if zed isn't fed, he wins

You might already know about this, but [this](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLUSnJ3s67h75aYRYjudxNGDN0_M7tatEo) is pretty much where everyone learns their Zed mechanics. There's even a special Kayle episode for you ;)
oh a zed main? do you afk or feed when things arent going your way?
haha no... When we're going shit, I roam to help other lanes when I'm Zed
